Name: Mr.Mech
Native_message:
알로에 님, 안녕하세요. 이런 감사를 표현하는 편지는 잘못 쓰지만, 한번 써보겠습니다. 지금까지 힘쓰고, 노력해주신 거에 대해서 감사를 드리고 싶습니다. 상황이 조금 꼬엿고, 힘들 것입니다. 물론, 이 상황이 터진 시기도 좋은 시기가 아녔습니다. 그러나, 아무리 Idol, 아이돌, 연예인이어도 (가상 아이돌이든 아니든) 우리는 인간입니다. 우리 모두 다요. 그리고 인간으로서, 우리는 크고 작은 실수를 만들 때가 있습니다. 그래서, 제가 하고 싶은 말은, 우리 모두 다 알로에 님을 위해 여기에서 기다릴 것입니다. 당신이란 사람을 좋아하고, 모든 크고 작은 문제와 고난들을 동반할 사람들 말입니다. 2주 동안 잘 쉬고, 강인하게 있으면 하는 바입니다.
힘차고 행복하게 돌아오는 날을 손꼽아 기다리고 있겠습니다.
EN_message:
Hello, Aloe-san. I'm personally not good at writing these thank you letters, but here it goes. Thank you for your hard work. The current situation is rough, and honestly, the timing wasn't that great as well. However, as much as you are an idol (Even if you may be a virtual one), you are still human as well. We all are. And as humans, we make mistakes, both big and small. However, I just want you to know, hey, everybody is here for you. People who like you for who you are, and will continue supporting you through thick and thin. Well, I guess I should say to have a nice rest for two weeks, and don't stay strong.
I hope to see you back, energetic and full of happiness

Name: Callisto
EN_message:
Hello, Aloe! 

Ever since you debuted, you piqued my interest thanks to your singing talent. I admire your level of maturity. It is something that a lot of people in this world including me lacks. I'm not going to say something like "Don't let the past keep you down." or anything similar. I think that it is okay to think about the past as a lesson but know that if it ever bothers you, you have your fans supporting you no matter what. Life is a rollercoaster as they say, it is full of ups, downs and even crazy loops sometimes but all that matters is that you enjoy the ride. We will be awaiting your return!
JP_message_Deepl:
アロエちゃん、こんにちは。

デビュー当時から歌唱力に興味を持っていました。アロエちゃんの成熟度に感心しています。私を含め、世の中の多くの人に欠けているものだと思います。「過去に負けるな」とか、そういうことを言うつもりはありません。過去を教訓にしてもいいと思うけど、気になることがあったら、何があっても応援してくれるファンがいることを知っておいてほしい。人生はジェットコースターと言われるように、起伏に満ちていて、時にはクレイジーなループもありますが、大切なのは、アロエちゃんが乗り心地を楽しむことです。私たちはアロエちゃんの復帰を待っています!

Name: Emile Louis
EN_message:
Bonjour Aloe,

I'm an oversea fan from France and I've watched your debut stream (even though I couldn't understand much lol). Thanks to the translations people made of it, I was able to enjoy your personality more and you've become my favorite 5th gen member. You've got a pretty voice and a unique personality. I really don't think you deserve what is happening to you right now but I'm sure you'll be able get back on your feet and become one of the most popular V-tubers. I'm gonna recommend your translated streams and hololive in general to my friends so that they can enjoy that kind of content like I do.
I'll be patiently waiting for your return !

私はフランスからの海外ファンで、あなたのデビューストリームを見ました(あまり理解できませんでしたが(笑))。 翻訳していただいたおかげで、あなたの人柄をより楽しむことができて、今では大好きな5th genのメンバーになりました。 声も可愛いし、個性的だし。 今のあなたに起きていることは本当に勿体ないことだと思うけど、きっと立ち直って人気のあるVチューバーの一人になれると信じているよ。 私はあなたの翻訳されたストリームやホロライブを友達に勧めて、彼らが私のようなコンテンツを楽しめるようにするつもりです。
あなたの復帰を辛抱強く待っています。

Name: zaezstarzlight

We make mistakes, You're human just like the rest of us and you have your own rights. Don't let a single day of backlash ruin your whole life! We will be welcoming your return with lots of support! Peace!

Name: MomoTomato
EN_message:
Hello Aloe-san! Overseas fan from Hong Kong here.

I really enjoyed Aloe-san’s debut stream! Especially when you sang, I really like your voice and I cannot wait for Aloe-san’s singing stream in the future!

It is unfortunate that such an incident has happened after Aloe-san’s debut, and things must have been really tough for you. But please do not forget that there is always a group of people who have your back, and are constantly supporting Aloe-san.

Even though I do not know the full truth behind what happened, but what I can say is that the past is the past, everyone makes mistakes, gain experience from it, and move on, so please don’t be sad lingering over this!

Meanwhile we, 魔の友 will all wait patiently during these two weeks, and I’m sure everyone will be there for a grand return celebration.

アロエちゃんが帰ってくる時を待っています。憎しみに負けないでください。ファンのみんなはあなたを応援しています。
ALOE LOVE! (アロエラブ！)

Name: deegeetal
EN_message: Greetings from the Philippines! I loved your debut, and I look forward to all your upcoming streams once you return. Never forget, there's a lot of people around the world continuing to support you. Keep doing your best!
JP_message_corrected: フィリピンからこんにちは！初配信大好きでした。そして今後の配信も楽しみにしてます。忘れないでね、世界中でアロエを応援してるファンがたくさんいます。頑張ってください！

Name: SaquenmeDePeru
EN_message:
Hi from Peru Aloe!!!
I hope you can solve all your problems and be happy, don't trouble for this things, the entire community follow and support you from our countries, in South and North America, Europe, Asia and the entire world you have people who worry for you and is happy when you are too, all of us wait you return whit a smile in our faces, because you are very important for this comunity!!!
JP_message_Deepl: ペルーのアロエからこんにちは！私はあなたがすべての問題を解決し、幸せになることができることを願っています。私はあなたがすべての問題を解決し、幸せになることができることを願っています、このことのために苦労しないでください、コミュニティ全体がフォローし、私たちの国からあなたをサポートしています、南と北アメリカ、ヨーロッパ、アジア、全世界では、あなたのために心配し、あなたがあまりにもあるときに幸せである人々を持っています、私たちのすべては、あなたがこのコミュニティにとって非常に重要であるため、私たちの顔に笑顔であなたが戻ってくるのを待っています!

Name: DonAngelRubio
EN_message:
Hello Aloe-chan, 
I think your debut was the best of the 5th generation, I really enjoyed it and I admire you a lot... you were brave enough to sing twice in your debut!!!
We are waiting for you with tons of love.
JP_message_Deepl:
アロエちゃん、こんにちは。
デビューは5代目の中で一番良かったと思います、本当に楽しかったし、尊敬します...デビューで2回も歌うなんて勇気がありましたね!
沢山の愛を込めて待っています。

Name: TheRandox
EN_message: Hi, Aloe-chan! I'm writing to you from Argentina. Due to the time difference between my country and yours (12 hours less), it's a bit complicated for me to watch your live videos scheduled in the afternoon/evening there, but that's not a big problem. I loved your version of "Happy Synthesizer", you have an excellent voice to sing. In fact, I want to tell you that you should come back with all your energy recharged and that nobody should stop you from what you like to do the most, you have a great future ahead of you. Finally, two sentences: "A stumble is not a fall", and "Whoever learns from his falls, has not made a mistake". I patiently await your return! Good luck, Aloe-chan!
JP_message_Deepl: アロエちゃん、こんにちは！ アルゼンチンからお手紙を書いています。私の国とあなたの国との時差（12時間の差）があるので、午後や夜に予定されているあなたのライブを見るのは少し複雑なのですが、大きな問題ではありません。私はハッピーシンセサイザーのあなたのバージョンを愛していました、あなたは素晴らしい歌声を持っています。実際、私はあなたに、すべてのエネルギーを充電して戻ってくるべきであり、誰もあなたが最も好きなことからあなたを止めるべきではないことを伝えたい、あなたはあなたの前に素晴らしい未来を持っています。最後に二文。「つまずきは転ぶことではない」「転んだことから学ぶ者は間違いを犯していない」。あなたの帰りを待っています。アロエちゃん、頑張ってね。

Name: ThreeDigit
EN_message: Greetings, Aloe-sama. I'm absolutely in love with you and your voice. I look forward to documenting your progress and being there as a proud manotomo for when you have attained your goal of becoming an accomplished singer in the future. Please come back soon, I can't wait to hear you sing more.
JP_message_Deepl: アロエ様、ご挨拶。私はあなたとあなたの声が大好きです。あなたが将来、歌手になるという目標を達成した時のために、あなたの成長を記録し、誇りに思っているマノトモとしてそこにいることを楽しみにしています。またすぐに戻ってきてください。

Name: Spica
EN_message:
Hello from Bolivia Aloe-san!
I was really happy watching your debut, specially to know the way you prepared it that day, enjoyable, absolutely friendly and lovable, indeed cause the time difference between countries I'm not be able to be watching all streams but for sure I will be watching your archive for that days. I know for sure you will accomplish all of your goals, and we'll be giving you our support and encouragement always! See you soon Aloe-san!
JP_message_Deepl:
ボリビアのアロエさんからこんにちは
デビューを見ていて本当に嬉しかったです。特に、あの日の準備の仕方を知ることができて、とても楽しかったです。あなたの目標は必ず達成されると思いますので、これからも応援しています。2週間に会おう！

Name: KyleDeBRUH
EN_message: Hello Aloe-sama,i hope you are doing well in there and i am not that good on making these types of_messages but i want to say that we will wait for you and continue to support you i cant wait to see you sing again in your following streams, Stay strong! uwu
JP_message_Deepl: 頑張っていることを願っていますし、私はこのようなタイプのメッセージを作るのが得意ではありませんが、私たちはあなたを待っていると言いたいのです。

Name: Jyagaimo
Native_message:
hola aloe-chan
Te envió este mensaje desde Chile 
Solo quería decirte que tu debut fue increíble, valio la pena la espera
Tu voz es de verdad hermosa, te recomiendo seguir cantando, puedes llegar muy lejos 
No dejes que esto te haga sufrir demasiado
Eres fuerte ^^
Siempre tendrás todo mi apoyo y el de muchos mas 
Solo hay que esquivar los obstáculos que nos pone la vida
Te estaré esperando para cuando vuelvas ^^
EN_message:
hi aloe-chan
He sent you this_message from Chile 
I just wanted to tell you that your debut was amazing, worth the wait
Your voice is really beautiful, I recommend you to keep singing, you can go very far 
Don't let this make you suffer too much
You are strong ^^
You will always have my full support and that of many others 
We just have to avoid the obstacles that life puts in our way
I'll be waiting for you when you get back ^^
JP_message_Deepl:
ハローアロエちゃん
彼はチリからこのメッセージを送ってきた あなたのデビューは素晴らしいものだったと伝えたかったのですが、待った甲斐がありました。
あなたの声は本当に美しいです、私はあなたが歌い続けることをお勧めします、あなたは非常に遠くに行くことができます。
これで苦しくならないように
強いですね^^。
あなたには常に私と他の多くの人々の全面的な支援があります。
私たちはただ人生が私たちの道に置く障害を回避する必要があります。
